_header: This far from you am I lady mistress
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, The pangs of true love, translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 60) — three l0-line stanzas (ababbccdcd) and four-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
THis fer from yow am y lady mastresSavyng myn hert which left is
                    with yow ay…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…But sende me lord a lak and make me fayneAs moche of weele as
                    y haue displesaunce
BLHar682.Editions:

                Captivity in England after the Battle of Azincourt
